self-serve-laundry.title: Self-Serve Laundry Austin | Best Self-Serve Laundromat Near Me

hero.heading: Self-Serve Laundry in Austin, TX
hero.subheading: The MAX Advantage: CLEANER. FASTER. SAFER.

mainContent.heading: The MAX Advantage: CLEANER. FASTER. SAFER.
mainContent.intro:
WaveMAX Laundry in Austin, TX has friendly staff, the best equipment in the region, and is clean and comfortable! Our fully-attended self-service laundromat is different than any other you have encountered. We are a family-owned and operated laundromat passionate about providing the best customer service! That means 100% complete satisfaction guaranteed! Come experience amazing today!

We have the best self-serve washing equipment in Austin. The efficiency of our washing machines and dryers will get you in and out in 1/2 the time of other laundromats. Seriously - "laundry day" becomes "laundry hour" with our 450G machines, touchless card payment, and UV sanitization. Experience our state-of-the-art laundromat today to find out for yourself. We are conveniently located at 825 E Rundberg Ln f1 Austin, TX 78753.

Rather have us do your laundry? No problem! Our convenient Drop-Off Laundry Service is a no-brainer. With this drop-off service, provide the soap and dryer sheets. We fold your laundry and hang up dresses, collared shirts, and dress pants to make our service as convenient as possible.

Own a business that goes through a lot of laundries? Try our Commercial Laundry Service today! There are no contracts, lower minimums, and faster turnaround time than the other laundry services in Austin.

benefits.title: Benefits of LUX System from Omni Solutions:
items: Increase the Life of your Clothes by 20%
Reduces water retention, making drying EVEN FASTER
Safe for all of your Laundry Needs

highlights.heading: CLEANEST LAUNDROMAT IN AUSTIN, TX
highlights.subheading: Save Time and Money with our FAST Washing Machines and Dryers!
highlights.content: We offer our customers the choice of doing their own laundry or utilizing our wash-dry-fold service. If you choose to do your own laundry, save money and time with our FAST self-serve washers and dryers. We have 42 Electrolux washers ranging from 20 lbs to 80 lbs. All are front-loading, and all operate the same way. We also have 42 top-of-the-line Electrolux Dryers. Remember, they are always HOT and provide faster drying times than other laundromats in the Austin, TX area.

amenities.heading: Modern Amenities
items: Text notifications when your laundry is done
Hospital-grade UV sanitization on every cycle
Full-time attendants during all business hours

employment.heading: JOIN THE WAVEMAX FAMILY
employment.content: Want to join our team? We'd love to work with you!

faqs.question: Are your machines clean?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our machines undergo hospital-grade UV sanitization with every wash cycle. We also have full-time attendants who maintain and clean the facility throughout the day.

faqs.question: What detergent should I use?
faqs.answer: You can bring your own detergent or purchase premium detergents from our vending machines. Our LUX system actually reduces the amount of detergent needed.

faqs.question: How do I pay for the machines?
faqs.answer: We accept credit cards, cash, and our WaveMAX card for touchless payment. Simply tap your card on the machine to start.

faqs.question: How long does a wash cycle take?
faqs.answer: Our high-efficiency machines complete a full wash cycle in about 30-40 minutes, with drying taking an additional 30-45 minutes. You'll be done in about half the time compared to traditional laundromats.

faqs.question: What if my clothes get damaged?
faqs.answer: We maintain our equipment to the highest standards. However, if you experience any issues, please speak with our attendants immediately and we'll work to resolve the situation.

faqs.question: Do you have Wi-Fi?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer free Wi-Fi throughout the facility. You can also sign up for text notifications when your laundry is done.

faqs.question: What sizes of washers do you have?
faqs.answer: We have 42 front-loading Electrolux washers ranging from 20 lbs to 80 lbs capacity, perfect for everything from small loads to large comforters.

faqs.question: Do you offer wash-dry-fold service?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer convenient drop-off laundry service at $1.20/lb with 24-hour turnaround. We fold your laundry and hang dresses, collared shirts, and dress pants.
